LightningComponentBundle.description: Create a branded Call-to-action that can be used anywhere on the page.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading Text
property.description: Text that will be displayed as the heading.

property.name: description
property.label: Description Text
property.description: Text that will be displayed as the description.

property.name: firstActionText
property.label: First Call To Action Text
property.description: This is the text that will be displayed for the first action.

property.name: firstActionUrl
property.label: First Call To Action URL
property.description: URL that the first call to action will navigate to.

property.name: secondActionText
property.label: Second Call To Action Text
property.description: This is the text that will be displayed for the second action.

property.name: secondActionUrl
property.label: Second Call To Action URL
property.description: URL that the second call to action will navigate to.

property.name: showButton
property.label: Show As Button
property.description: When checked this will display the actions as a button.

property.name: imageReference
property.label: Select Icon
property.description: Specify a SLDS icon to display on the button. You have to specify an icon category and icon name separated by a ":", for example utility:check. For more information or to view available icons visit the SLDS website: https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: iconSize
property.label: Icon Size
property.description: This determines the size of the icon

property.name: iconPosition
property.label: Icon Position
property.description: This will control where the icon will be displayed based on the content.
property.datasource: Left - Top, Left - Middle, Left - Bottom, Top - Left, Top - Center, Top - Right, Right - Top, Right - Middle, Right - Bottom

property.name: textAlign
property.label: Text Align
property.description: Specifies the text alignment of the content.

property.name: darkFont
property.label: Dark Font?
property.description: This controls the content text color. If checked the content will be displayed in a dark font color.

property.name: removeMargin
property.label: Remove Component Bottom Margin
property.description: Removes the margin that is applied to the bottom of the component by Salesforce

property.name: customClass
property.label: Add Class
property.description: Custom CSS class name(s).
